name: House of Dreams (leey921)
description:
Team: Bhuvan, Kevin, Yeonseo

You’re trapped in the House of Dreams. You need to collect the keys and unlock the doors to wake up. Be careful, there are traps hidden throughout. If you get caught in them, you’ll lose a life!

Use keys to open doors and collect coins to extend your lives.

First room: Find two keys to open a room, and get the master key to move to the other room.

Second room: Find the key and move to the next room. Be careful with the trap door.

Last room: Find the keys and escape the room. Try to avoid traps. Control is important for the last room.

-----------------------------------------------
